title: Disney Codenames
creator: Vlaada Chvátil
description: Give your teammates one word clues so they can guess the right Disney characters. But be careful- if they guess wrong it could give the other team points!
subject: Cooperation;Guessing;Memory
supported: 2 players;3 players;4 players;5 players;6 players;7 players;8 players

title: Carcassonne
creator: Klaus-Jürgen Wrede
description: Take turns placing tiles to build out roads, chapels, farms, and walled cities. The larger the territory your Meeples occupy, the more points you get.
subject: Tile Placement;Area Control

title: PARKS
creator: Henry Audubon
description: Hike your way through this game while visiting national parks! The park cards all feature beautifully unique art styles.
subject: Resource Management;Set Collection;Card Drafting;Modular Board;Open Market

title: Yokohama
creator: Hayashi Hisashi
description: As a merchant in the burgeoning port town of 1910 Yokohama, gain victory by fulfilling export orders, learning foreign technology, and buliding trading houses to develop the city.
subject: Open Market;Worker Placement;Modular Board;Resource Management

title: Villainous
creator: Prospero Hall
description: Take on the role of a classic Disney villain and pursue your nefarious goals. Thwart your opponents by playing cards to disrupt their plans.
subject: Sabotage;Hand Management;Action Point Allowance

title: Race for the Galaxy
creator: Thomas Lehman
description: Build out your intergalactic tableau to produce goods, build larger structures, and secure the most victory points.
subject: Engine Building;Hand Management;Simultaneous Action Selection;Variable Phase Order

title: Bananagrams
creator: Rena Nathanson, Abe Nathanson
description: Arrange a random set of letters into a grid of words that grows with each letter added. Stay adaptable in case you need to rearrange
subject: Spelling;Spatial Thinking

title: Taco Cat Goat Cheese Pizza
creator: Dave Campbell
description: Get slappy! Put cards down on the table while saying Taco, Cat, Goat, Cheese, Pizza. If the card you play matches the word you say, slap the deck as fast as you can.
subject: Dexterity
supported: 2 players;3 players;4 players;5 players;6 players;7 players;8 players

title: 7 Wonders Duel
creator: Antoine Bauza, Bruno Cathala
description: This 2 player game puts you at the beginning of civilization. Build up your society by developing technology and building up the wonders of the ancient world.
subject: Engine Building;Card Drafting;City Building

title: Catan
creator: Klaus Teuber
description: Gain victory points by building roads, settlements, and cities on the island of Catan. Roll the dice and trade with your opponents to gain resources in this classic game.
subject: Dice;Resource Management;Trading;Point to Point Movement;Modular Board

title: Spirit Island
creator: R. Eric Reuss
description: Work together as the island's powerful native spirits to drive away colonial invaders. Manage the colonizers' spread while working with the island's native to secure victory.
subject: Combat;Action Point Allowance;Cooperation;Variable Player Powers;Hand Management;Engine Building

title: Everdell
creator: James Wilson
description: Taking place across four seasons, manage your woodland workers to gather resources and grow your city. Fill it with adorable little woodland creatures and structures, each with their own unique abilities.
subject: Engine Building;Resource Management;Worker Placement;Card Drafting;City Building;Open Market

title: Chess
creator: Unknown
description: The rules are simple, but the strategies are endlessly complex. Coordinate the unique movement patterns of your pieces to put your opponent's king in checkmate.
subject: Grid Movement;Spatial Thinking

title: Super Big Boggle
creator: Bill Cooke, Alan Turoff
description: How many words can you find before the timer runs out? Shake up the letters and see which ones you can connect to find more words than your opponent.
subject: Spelling

title: Pandemic
creator: Matt Leacock
description: Maybe not the best game to play these days, but in this co-op game, collaborate to stop the spread of four diseases and find their cures before its too late.
subject: Cooperation;Simultaneous Action Selection;Hand Management

title: Sagrada
creator: Adrian Adamescu, Daryl Andrews
description: Draft colorful dice to build exquisitely patterned stain glass windows. The more patterns you make, the higher your score.
subject: Dice;Pattern Building;Set Collection

title: Machi Koro
creator: Masao Suganuma
description: Construct buildings from cafes to stadiums to fill up your town. Roll dice to activate their abilities and be the first to construct your four major establishments to win.
subject: Dice;City Building

title: The Search for Planet X
creator: Matthew OMalley, Ben Rosset
description: The only game that has an app component to it, test your deduction and logic skill to be the first to find the mysterious Planet X.
subject: Deduction;Action Point Allowance

title: Innovation
creator: Carl Chudyk
description: Starting at the Stone Age, learn technologies to build your way up from textiles to the Internet. Gather points along the way and reach special goals to win.
subject: Engine Building;Hand Management;Card Drafting

title: A Little Wordy
creator: Matthew Inman
description: A spelling game with a twist. Come up with a word with a set of tiles. Then, use cards to help you narrow down your opponent's word. The harder your word is to guess, the better.
subject: Spelling;Deduction

title: The Fox in the Forest
creator: Joshua Beurgel
description: A quick and tricky trick taking game with a fairy tale theme. Gain tricks to win, but be careful not to be too greedy- this might cost you points in the end!
subject: Trick Taking

title: Connect 4
creator: Ned Srongin, Howard Wexler
description: Easy to learn, hard to master. Connect four of your pieces vertically, horizontally, or diagonally, to win in this classic game.
subject: Pattern Building
